wybug_title: 搜狐畅游敏感信息泄露
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-11：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-21：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 搜狐畅游敏感信息泄露 详细说明：  github源码，导致内部邮箱泄露
https://github.com/lili6/tessar-server/blob/0f76d068af65a783d16d5124e576c323d292825c/tessar/src/main/java/com/cyou/scheduler/crashscheduler/db/mongodb/SendEMailMongoDBPage.java

String smtp = "smtp.cyou-inc.com";// smtp服务器				String from = "CrashReport@cyou-inc.com";// 邮件显示名称				String to[] = {"yueweijia@cyou-inc.com","lixiang@cyou-inc.com","liuyong@cyou-inc.com","liudacheng@cyou-inc.com","wangmingyang@cyou-inc.com",						"wangpan@cyou-inc.com","zhaoyan@cyou-inc.com","wangjian_pg@cyou-inc.com","fujieshuang@cyou-inc.com","lishilong@cyou-inc.com",						"yueweijia@happy.com","lixiang@happy.com","liuyong@happy.com","liudacheng@happy.com","wangmingyang@happy.com","wangpan@happy.com",						"zhaoyan@happy.com","wangjian_pg@happy.com","fujieshuang@happy.com","lishilong@happy.com"};// 收件人的邮件地址，必须是真实地址				String copyto[] = {""};// 抄送人邮件地址				String bcopyto[] = {"zhangwenping@cyou-inc.com"};// 加密抄送人邮件地址				String subject = "";// 邮件标题				String content = "";// 邮件内容				String username = "CrashReport";// 发件人真实的账户名				String password = "abcd.1234";// 发件人密码
CrashReportabcd.1234成功登陆内部邮箱mail.cyou-inc.com

   漏洞证明：

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：3  确认时间：2015-02-11 10:37 厂商回复： 已安排修复，非常感谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
